模块 org.overrun.swgl.core
程序包 org.overrun.swgl.core.gl.ims

类 GLImmeMode

java.lang.Object
org.overrun.swgl.core.gl.ims.GLImmeMode
@Experimental public class GLImmeMode extends Object
The OpenGL immediate mode simulator.

The functions start with 'lgl' that means 'legacy GL'.

从以下版本开始:
0.1.0
作者:
squid233
